name: BucksBus
author: BucksBus

sections.description:
Cryptocurrency payment gateway for WooCommerce and BucksBus. Receive coins directly into your BuckBus account.

Cryptocurrencies supported:

  • Bitcoin BTC
  • Ethereum ETH
  • Tron TRX
  • Litecoin LTC
  • Polygon POL
  • Tether USDT (ERC20)
  • Tether USDT (TRC20)
  • Tether USDT (POLY)

Legal

This plugin uses BucksBus API.

BucksBus API URL

BucksBus API Docs

BucksBus Terms of Service

BucksBus Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin
  2. Visit Admin > WooCommerce > Settings > Payment
  3. Visit the gateway settings for each cryptocurrency.
  4. Complete API Key, API Secret and Webhook secret fields to finish the setup. The instructions for each field are provided.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Add support for POL, remove support for MATIC

1.0.2

  • Add support for USDC.POLY, remove support for USDC.E.POLY

1.0.1

  • Add support for LTC, MATIC, USDT.POLY, USDC.E.POLY

1.0.0

  • Initial release
